summary: We're excited to introduce the new and improved Edge Rules for Bunny CDN.  The update brings an improved interface, multi-action rule support, and new actions and triggers.  We've made Edge Rules not only easier to set up but also more powerful
title: Introducing the new and improved Edge Rules!

summary:
I'm not one to really worry about page view metrics, but I do like to see which of my posts attract the most attention - and where that attention might be coming from.  That insight has allowed me to find new blogs and sites that have linked to mine, and has tipped me off that maybe I should update that four-year-old post that's suddenly getting renewed traffic from Reddit. 
In my quest for such knowledge, last week I switched my various web properties back to using Cabin‚Üó for "privacy-first, carbon conscious web analytics"...
title: Kudos With Cabin
